description.en:
Mangaupdates:
A 59 pages story set in feudal Japan about a love story between Nohime and Nobunaga, two historical figures during that era.


First published in volume by year 1979 in a collection bearing the same name, along with Christmas no Kiseki 1975, Ojousan wa Genshijin 1970, Monkey Rock 1970 and Miuchi Suzue shi Chousa Houkoku
(Essay by IMAI Kaoru). On Hana to Yume Comics. Recently reprinted on Suzue Miuchi Best Works 6 (1997).

This is the 5th volume of the Miuchi Suzue Masterpiece Collection

1: 聖アリス帝国 (Sei Alice Teikoku)
2: アマランスの女王 (Amaranth no Jou)
3: 日本列島一万年 (Nihon Rettou Ichimannen)
4: バラ物語 (Bara Monogatari)
5: 虹の戦 (Niji no Ikusa)
6: 雪の音 (Yuki no Oto)
7: すばらしき遺産 (Subarashiki Isan)
